name: Back Venge
description:
In the distant future, a maximum security prison holds a crook named Samantha, who's performed one of the worst crimes imaginable, CROSS DRESSING! (Also tampering with time). While reading about his incarceration by the hands of the cop that arrested him, a gun fell into his cell out thin air. Realizing that the gun is capable of manipulating time, Samantha sets out to break out of prison and kill the cop that caught him.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Aim - mouse
  • Shoot - left click
  • Rewind shots - right click

Credits:

  • Matthew Fong (Game Designer/Level Designer)
  • William Zhang (Programming)
  • Raihane AKKACHE (Programming)
  • Anna "FireDragis" Straková  (Character Art)
  • Stephen O-Mensah (Level Art)
  • Julio Reyes (Music & SFX)
  • Aaron "Ronnie" Jones (Producer)
